title: Textile, 1775–95
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp: 155.5cm (61 in.). Weft 92cm (36 1/4in.). Both selvedges present..
description: Alternation of two stripes, on in straight repeat, the other in offset repeat. The straight repeat is a folded ribbon of lace, the offset repeat is a flower and a ribbon-tied branch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1775–95.
1775–95. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-221.
